title: Magic Face C4-Piano
summary: Tap each piano key separately on your watch to change interactive function!
description: A watch face without interactive functions is not a good watch face, with one tap, information will show on your wrist !First Interactive FunctionsTap each piano key on your watch to area, weather forecast info will show up-Tap on the alarm area, you can set an new clock alarmSteps1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not. 4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.Weather1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !Clock AlarmSet a new clock descriptionHTML:
A watch face without interactive functions is not a good watch face, with one tap, information will show on your wrist !

First Interactive Functions
Tap each piano key on your watch to change interactive functions!
Key 1-Time, date and week
Key 2-Steps
Key 3-Weather
Key 4-Clock alarm

Second Interactive Functions
-Tap on the steps area, your step history will show up
-Tap on the weather area, weather forecast info will show up
-Tap on the alarm area, you can set an new clock alarm

Steps
1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.
2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .
3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not.
4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.

Weather
1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days
2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !

Clock Alarm
Set a new clock alarm

More Faces
If you like interactive watch face C4-Piano, feel free to try our new face platform Magic Watchface:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices:
C4-Piano supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About Us
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, a Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
